title: Brand New Luxury House for Sale
details:
Brand New Luxury House for Sale!
Dehiwala Vishnukovil Road
Build on 6.5 perches of land
4 Bed Rooms , 4 bathrooms
(2 attached)
Modern Kitchen with pantry
Fully tiled with modern interior design
2 halls
2 large vehicle parking
2 floors and a Rooftop
Rs. 43,000,000/=
